Published November 9 2014

Outdoor Voices athletic gear

Outdoor Voices athletic gear — Neat concept, athletic gear for those not conservatively “athletic,” but if you’re trying to market to a group that doesn’t want to look like a Nike athlete, $120 for sweatpants is the wrong way to run.

Enjoy your day.
